name: VAXIGRIP
treatmentDescriptions: Prevention of influenza disease caused by the two influenza A virus subtypes and the influenza B virus type contained in the vaccine for:- active immunisation of adults, including pregnant women, and children from 6 months of age and older, - passive protection of infant(s) from birth to less than 6 months of age following vaccination of pregnant women The use of Vaxigrip should be based on official recommendations on vaccination against influenza
ingredients: B/AUSTRIA/1359417/2021-LIKE STRAIN (B/MICHIGAN/01/2021, WILD TYPE)HA, A/CROATIA/10136RV/2023 (H3N2)-LIKE STRAIN (A/CROATIA/10136RV/2023, X-425A)HA, A/VICTORIA/4897/2022 (H1N1)PDM09-LIKE STRAIN (A/VICTORIA/4897/2022, IVR-238)HA

atc5.name: INFLUENZA, INACTIVATED, SPLIT VIRUS OR SURFACE ANTIGEN
